relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare DLP
relatedBlades.subtitle: Protecting your organization's most sensitive data
relatedBlades.copy:
With the shift to hybrid work, it is harder than ever to maintain visibility and security controls over how users move and store data across cloud environments. At the same time, the financial and reputational risks to losing sensitive data are higher than ever â€“ with [IBM's latest research](https://www.ibm.com/security/data-breach) estimating the average cost of a data breach at $4.35M.

Reduce your organizational risk by taking a proactive approach to data security. Cloudflare Data Loss Prevention (DLP) secures sensitive data in transit. Plus, our DLP is built into our [broader Zero Trust platform](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/), which verifies, filters, and isolates all traffic to provide holistic protection across your users, devices, applications, and the Internet.

features.title: Reduce cyber risk
features.description: Prevent data exfiltration by insiders or external threats, whether unintentional or malicious. Secure sensitive info like Credit Card and U.S. Social Security Numbers.

features.title: Expand visibility
features.description: Expand visibility and control over movement of sensitive data across cloud environments and the Internet for remote and on-site users and devices

features.title: Strengthen compliance
features.description: Equip your teams with the logs and data controls they need to stay compliant with regulations, audits, and data governance best practices.

relatedBlades.title: Inspect and control traffic after detecting sensitive data
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare DLP inspects HTTP/S traffic and files like Microsoft Office documents for the presence of sensitive data such as credit card information and social security numbers. After identifying the data you would like to protect, you can easily configure DLP profiles with allow or block policies to prevent information from leaving your corporate tenants.

features.title: Cloudflare is the only new vendor in the 2023 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ„¢ for Security Service Edge (SSE)
features.description: Cloudflare has been recognized in the 2023 GartnerÂ® Magic Quadrantâ„¢ for Security Service Edge (SSE) report. We believe our recognition validates our commitment to continue advancing our Zero Trust platform to help secure hybrid work.

imageAssetFile.title: Gartner Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a Strong Performer in "The Forrester Waveâ„¢: Zero Trust Platforms, Q3 2023
features.description: Cloudflare cites continued disruptive momentum in the SSE market, receiving the highest scores possible, 5.0/5.0, in the innovation, roadmap, pricing flexibility & transparency, and hybrid workforce enablement & protection criteria.

imageAssetFile.title: Forrester Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

features.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE
features.description: Through its 2023 SASE market analysis, KuppingerCole Analysts AG cited several Cloudflare strengths such as our large globally distributed presence and sophisticated traffic acceleration, massive backbone capacity, 100% uptime guarantee, and innovative Remote Browser Isolation.

imageAssetFile.title: KuppingerCole Logo narrow aspect ratio with space

relatedBlades.title: Comprehensive data security with Cloudflare One
relatedBlades.copy: __Cloudflare One__ our [SASE](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/access-management/what-is-sase/) platform, stops data from leaving controlled environments by leveraging the power of our global network to control authorized access and user permissions; log every IP, DNS and HTTP request; and scan incoming and outgoing data across all apps.

relatedBlades.title: Effectively secure your data with a Zero Trust approach.

buttonOne.elementName: Get started zero trust roadmap CTA

relatedBlades.title: DLP is built to work seamlessly across our security services and our network
relatedBlades.subtitle: The Cloudflare difference

features.title: Deployment simplificity
features.description: Turn on natively-integrated DLP with a few clicks in our Zero Trust dashboard.

features.title: Network resiliency
features.description: Lightning-fast TLS 1.3 inspection in all data centers for better user experiences

features.title: Innovation velocity
features.description: Our platform is architected to evolve rapidly in response to emerging business needs

resourceList.title: Cloudflare DLP & CASB - Product Overview [ZT PMM]
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare's Integrated DLP & CASB Product Overview
topic: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce
resourceList.description: Learn how Cloudflare DLP + CASB improves visibility and reduces risk of exfiltration as data moves across all web, SaaS, and self-hosted/private apps.

resourceList.title: Demo: Cloudflare One for Data Protection
resourceList.resourceTitle: Demo: Cloudflare One for Data Protection
topic: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce
resourceList.description: Cloudflare offers a unified SSE platform for managing data across all states, and in any environment. In this demo, see how Cloudflare One helps organizations to comply with regulations, mitigate the risks of data exposure across application environments, and secure developer code.

resourceList.title: Infographic: Cloudflare One for Data Protection
resourceList.resourceTitle: Infographic: How modern coding, AI, and cloud impact your data protection strategy.
topic: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce
resourceList.description: In this infographic, explore how uniquely modern risks like sprawling cloud and SaaS environments, modern coding practices, and emerging AI tools demand a modern approach to security.

resourceList.title: Blog: DLP Exact Data Match beta now available
resourceList.resourceTitle: DLP Exact Data Match beta now available
topic: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce
resourceList.description: With Exact Data Match (EDM), create targeted DLP detections for your organization. Customers can now securely tell us what data they want to protect via custom data sets, and then we identify, log, and block the presence or movement of that data.

resourceList.title: Blog: Cloudflare One DLP integrates with Microsoft Information Protection labels
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare One DLP integrates with Microsoft Information Protection labels
topic: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce
resourceList.description: Simply integrate with your Microsoft account, retrieve your labels, and build rules to guide the movement of your labeled data. This extends the power of Microsoft's labels to any of your corporate traffic in just a few clicks.

resourceList.title: Blog: Announcing Custom DLP profiles
topic: Enable Zero Trust Security for Workforce
resourceList.description: Learn how to build custom DLP detections to identify other types of sensitive data, such as IP, code, and trade secrets, using Cloudflare One.
